tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentencing_disparities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defendant_name VARCHAR(50),
  offense VARCHAR(100),
  sentence_duration INT,
  judge_name VARCHAR(50),
  court_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE SentencingDisparities (
	sentencing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	offense_type TEXT,
	offense_severity TEXT,
	sentence_length INT,
	sentencing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SentencingDisparities (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defendant_name VARCHAR(50),
    offense_description TEXT,
    sentence_length INT,
    race VARCHAR(20),
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE defendants (
  defendant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  race VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  sentence_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sentence_id) REFERENCES sentences(sentence_id)
);

CREATE TABLE court_cases (
  case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  defendant_id INT,
  judge_id INT,
  verdict VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (defendant_id) REFERENCES defendants(defendant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (judge_id) REFERENCES judges(judge_id)
);

CREATE TABLE defendants (
  defendant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defendant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  race VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  case_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sentences (
  sentence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  defendant_id INT,
  judge_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  verdict VARCHAR(50)
);
